A

addEventObserver(observer) - Method in interface com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call.Call
Method to add an observer to the call. The observer will be notified when a status change has occurred
addObserver(callParticipantObserver) - Method in class com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call.participant.CallParticipants
Method to add an observer to the call participants. The observer will be notified when a status change has occurred for each user
addObserver(observer) - Method in class com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call_center.CallCenter
Method to add an observer for incoming calls The observer will be notified when a new call has arrived
addStatusObserver(observer) - Method in class com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call_center.CallCenter
Method to add an observer for CallCenter's status changes The observer will be notified when a new status ahs been set
answer() - Method in interface com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call.IncomingCall
Method to invoke to answer a call
